description: Unable to access deployment dashboard after successful login
Authentication tokens expire too quickly during long development sessions
Users cannot connect their GitHub repository for automatic deployments
Request for built-in support for multiple environment variables configuration
Need ability to rollback deployments with a single click
Dashboard UI is not intuitive for managing multiple Remix projects
Team members cannot access shared workspace despite having correct permissions
Deployment logs are difficult to search and filter
Request for integrated performance monitoring tools
SSO integration fails for enterprise customers
